name: Color City Revolution
description:
Mac and Linux users, we made an oopsie! Our HTML5 version was deleted by mistake and we cannot upload it until the end of the jam. If you are keen to test it, access this website, where we've uploaded the game. It is the exact same game, bugs and all, so you can use it for evaluating the game. Thank you, and we are sorry <3.

June 13, 2007:

For too long, the United States has been under the ruthless control of The Clay Color Company, who has monopolized all color in the United States of America. CEO Clay Color has used all the color in the United States to build Color City, a bright utopia on the outside that holds dark secrets underneath.

System Zero, the AI President of the United States, has sent System 42, created after combining two of the United States' most advanced androids, to address CEO Clay Color directly using and thwart his secret plan to take over the United States.

How to play:

  • Move - WASD keys (only the gun android moves)
  • Shoot - Left Mouse Click
  • Shield AOE Attack - Right Mouse Click
  • Swap Characters - Spacebar

You are 2 units connected, the enemy will attack the bond until it is broken, kill the enemies before they destroy the bond. 

If your current position doesn’t favor you, press space and interchange the positions of gun and shield. 

Low on health? Stretch the bond separating gun and shield as far as you can, that way you will recover health. If there are too many enemies on screen just put the shield near them and destroy them all with a powerful EMP attack.
